name: G Portable Types - C/C++ Languages Versi
short_description: Portable Source Code (C/C++ programming language) that provides multi-platform portability for data types (numeric, conditional, etc.). Types like 'unsigned 32 bits int', 'boolean expression', etc. all are part of this package.No libraries, just headers.
